name: promise_perf
description: The Promise Perf library allows you to instrument a Promise chain

scripts.prettier:fix: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E '.[tj]?sx?$|.yaml$|.json$' | xargs -P 1 prettier --write
scripts.prettier:check: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E '.[tj]?sx?$|.yaml$|.json$' | xargs -P 1 -I "{}" sh -c '[ -f {} ] && echo {} || true' | xargs prettier --check

author: Benn Bollay
